Classes in bomberman.core.graphics used by bomberman.core.graphics
DecoratedEntityEngine
          The DecoratedEntityEngine class manages the GfxObject acting in the.
DecoratedWorld
          The DecoratedWorld class represents the graphics side of the LogicWorld.
GfxObject
          The GfxObject Interface represents the graphics aspect of the PhysicsEntity, it provides some graphics methods inherited from PlayN and delegate the GfxObject.update(int) method to the logic structure.
LayerManager
          A class for managing the four groups of layers used in the game.
Sprite
          The Sprite class contains all details about the animation that will be played through the SpritePlayer.
SpritePlayer
          The SpritePlayer class reproduces Sprite animations reading sequentially the sprite sheet frame by frame.
